entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 07:30 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -14.0°C
Wind: W 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets overnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries changing to flurries in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023
